creator: Red Edge Studio
descriptionHtml:
Are you want a tool to view and read all documents in your android device? Are you want to MS Office reader and viewer? So here is, All Document Reader - Office View, Word, Document, Sheet, Slide, PDF Viewer is a fast way of reading Word documents on your device. It supports viewing of Word files. All Document Reader: Office Viewer is offering features of reading multiple Documents including doc, pdf, ppt, txt, excel, xml, html, rtf & other document files.

💖 Key Features of All Document viewer: Files Reader, Office Viewer: 💖
👉 Document manager- All files reader & viewer
All document files are managed and organized in folder structure view. All the document files are also available in a single place, making it easy to search and document viewer. Document reader for android lets you easily view Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text and PDF files Supports multiple compatibility with office formats including PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, XLS, PPT, PPTX,HTML,XML,RTF.

👉 Word file reader- Read your docx files
This app act as Docx viewer with a simple and elegant reader screen which has the essential controls. Find any desired file quickly with the simple search option. Docx file readers represent all formats of documents in the best way.

👉 xls, xlsx file reader spreadsheet reader.
This app act as Xls viewer to read all excel file formats. View file xls, xlsx, txt with high quality view

👉 PPT Files reader.
It also support PPT files with high resolution and fast performance. Search, Delete, View All Document file easily

👉 PDF Viewer - Ebook Reader
you can open, view PDF files from the file manager or directly from other apps
All PDF files are displayed in a simple list. Search, scroll, and zoom in and out. Easily print and share PDF documents through another app. Read PDF as a book

👉 Document Manager
The office viewer allows you to manage and arrange all document files in folder structure view. All document files are also available in a single place which is very easy to search and view.

👉 File Viewer
This Document viewer / Document reader for android lets you easily view Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text and PDF files. It also supports multiple compatibility with office formats including DOC and DOCX, EXEL, TXT, PPT and PPTX and PDF.

👉 Supported formats
1. PDF files
2. Word Document: DOC, DOCX
3. Excel Document: XLS, XLSX
4. Slide Document: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX
5. Other Word Office reader and files: TXT, ODT, Zip
6. Super easy to use and no internet needed.

👉 PPT Reader / View PPTX Slide
Power point filescan be easily browse & open as slides, presentations files on device
👉 Doc Viewer / Doc Reader
Docx Reader or docx viewer is the best & fast way of reading Word documents on your mobile phone. Word viewer is a simple & lightweight app. Docx file readers represent all formats of documents in the best way

👉 PDF Viewer / PDF Reader
Read PDF files easily just tap and done. Fast and stable performance. Automatically resume the latest page. Goto page number directly. PDF File View allow you to Zoom-in and Zoom-out for perfect vision. Search, create, save the pdf file quickly. Easily share & send PDF Files

👉 Excel Viewer - Excel Reader
Calculations and other database are can be viewed as Excel sheet viewer read all excel file formats. Excel File Reader or excel file viewer does not required any internet connection to view

Note: This is a free app supported by ads only. We are continuously working on updates, any suggestion, question or query will be appreciated. So feel free to contact us on megagamesmart@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Office Suite and Documents viewer, read PDF, ppt, doc, excel, txt, xml, html.
title: All Document Reader - Office
